job.name: Azure_Update_Deployed_Service

variable.name: CONTAINER_PLATFORM
variable.description: The container platform to be used for executing the workflow tasks.

variable.name: CONTAINER_GPU_ENABLED
variable.description: If True, it will activate the use of GPU for the workflow tasks on the selected container platform.

variable.name: CONTAINER_IMAGE
variable.description: The Name of the container image being used to run the workflow tasks.

variable.name: AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID
variable.description: The Azure subscription identifier. You can create a free account on this link https://azure.microsoft.com/en-gb/free/

variable.name: AZURE_RESOURCE_GROUP
variable.description: The Azure resources group that you have created in your Azure account.

variable.name: AZURE_WORKSPACE_NAME
variable.description: The workspace name that you have created in your Azure account.

job.description: Update the Deployed Service on Azure.

task.name: Azure_Update_Deployed_Service
task.description: Update the Deployed Service on Azure.

variable.name: AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID
variable.description: The Azure subscription identifier. You can create a free account on this link https://azure.microsoft.com/en-gb/free/

variable.name: AZURE_RESOURCE_GROUP
variable.description: The Azure resources group that you want to use for the deployment.

variable.name: AZURE_WORKSPACE_NAME
variable.description: The workspace name that you have created in your Azure account.

variable.name: SERVICE_NAME
variable.description: The name of the service that will be deployed on Azure.

variable.name: MODEL_NAME
variable.description: The name of the model to be deployed.

variable.name: MODEL_URL
variable.description: A valid URL specified by the user referencing the model that needs to be deployed.

variable.name: SERVICE_DESCRIPTION
variable.description: The name of the service where the model will be deployed.

variable.name: EXECUTION_SCRIPT_URL
variable.description: This entry script starts the service and defines the different functions to deploy the model, scores the prediction requests based on the deployed model.

variable.name: CONDA_FILE_URL
variable.description: This CONDA file defines the conda execution environment of the service.

variable.name: DOCKER_FILE_URL
variable.description: This DOCKER file defines the required dependencies needed to build the docker image. This image will be used by the service.

metadata.visualization: Azure_Update_Deployed_Service
